sense.gloss: getting deeply involved, going deeply into, going too far (into something)

sdata.j: ↑母↑↓はは↓は、↑長女↑↓ちょうじょ↓が↑芝居↑↓しばい↓の↑研究↑↓けんきゅう↓↑会↑↓かい↓にはいっていることは↑知↑↓し↓っていたが、まさか↑舞台↑↓ぶたい↓に↑出↑↓で↓るまで|↑深入↑↓ふかい↓り|しているとは、↑知↑↓し↓らなかった。
sdata.e: Her mother knew that her eldest daughter had signed up for a drama seminar, but she had no idea that she was so deeply involved as to appear on stage.
